strings.Value: "What's going on here?"
"Clear the road and let these people pass!"
"Not a bad set-up you got here. How about you work for me?"
[Attack] "You should have run while you could."
"I am the {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen} of this realm, and I didn't order anyone to guard this bridge."
"The Stag Lord? The Stag Lord is dead. What is this nonsense?"
"Who gave you the right to extort passers-by?"
"What are these monsters you're talking about?"
"Enough."
"Where is this 'Stag Lord' of yours?"
"I should go."
"How goes your duties?"
[Attack] "I've had enough of brigands in my lands!"

{n}The cutthroat in front of you is well-armed, as are the other warriors behind him. He turns to face you.{/n} "Hey, get in line! Watch where ye're goin'..." {n}The man trails off as he sees your face — he recognizes you.{/n}

"By the Gods! The {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}! What the... what brings you here?" {n}The man glances at his companions, who look equally uncertain what to do, and turns red.{/n} "Eh, well, err... of course you can pass, Yer {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness}!'
"Yes, {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}?"
"Well, now, we... we're guarding the bridge, {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}! From monsters and others. On the Stag Lord's orders."
{n}The bandit swallows.{/n} "It's ahhhh... like... an order's an order! We're the Stag Lord's people. He says — guard the bridge, we guard the bridge!"
"Gotta peel yer eyes, Yer {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness}! Alive, he is! See for yourself — there he is, keeping watch over us himself!"
"We have to eat, as much as anyone else — hunger will take us if we've no coin."

"Why, eh... {mf|baron|baroness|king|queen}... all kinds, all kinds! Not long ago, a hydra popped up on the other side o' the river. Right, men?" {n}The warriors nod.{/n} "A fat, long-fanged bastard, too! Now, Your {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness} — what happens if that thing gets it into its head to feast on folk crossing the bridge? And that's not the worst of it — there's goblins sneaking all about as well, snatching everything that's not tied down!"
{n}The man falls silent. The men behind him all looking at their feet uncomfortably.{/n}

"But, but... see..." {n}The man takes a breath, and leans in.{/n} "{mf|Baron|Baroness|King|Queen}, I'm nothing, a pair of hands — I collect the money, see, and let through ones that pay. It'd be better if you took the matter up with the Stag Lord, have a chat with him."

{n}The man's eyes light up — then a worried expression crosses his face.{/n} "Yer {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness}, me and the boys would like that, we would! But, see, we already answer to the Stag Lord... maybe you should have a word with him about it?"
"There, see, right there. Go up to him, he's the one to talk to."
{n}The man gives a wide grin.{/n} "Easy pickings, Yer {mf|Grace|Grace|Highness|Highness}! Doing well as before, but now's it's easier getting them to part with their coin now we have your blessing!"
